concept.title: Required Fields
concept.shortdesc: You can configure required fields for any processor and most destination stages. A required field must exist in a record to allow the record to enter the stage for processing. When a record does not include a required field, the record is passed to the pipeline for error handling.

conbody.p: pipelinesrequired fieldsrequired fieldsoverviewYou can configure different required fields in different stages. Configure required fields based on your business requirements or in order to minimize processing errors.
For example, a Field Hasher encodes social security data in the /SSN field. To ensure processing only records that include social security numbers, make /SSN a required field.
